mapper.select: SELECT a.RESERVATIONID, a.RESERVATIONDATE, a.RESERVATIONSTATUS, b.COURSETIME, c.STYLISTID, c.STYLISTNAME FROM TRNRESERVATION a LEFT JOIN MSTCOURSE b ON b.COURSEID = a.COURSEID LEFT JOIN MSTSTYLIST c ON a.STYLISTID = c.STYLISTID WHERE a.RESERVATIONDATE > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND RESERVATIONDATE < DATE_FORMAT(Date_Add(NOW(), INTERVAL+1 DAY), '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY a.RESERVATIONDATE

SELECT a.RESERVATIONID, a.RESERVATIONDATE, a.RESERVATIONSTATUS, b.COURSETIME, c.STYLISTID, c.STYLISTNAME FROM TRNRESERVATION a LEFT JOIN MSTCOURSE b ON b.COURSEID = a.COURSEID LEFT JOIN MSTSTYLIST c ON a.STYLISTID = c.STYLISTID WHERE a.RESERVATIONDATE > DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y%m%d') AND RESERVATIONDATE < DATE_FORMAT(Date_Add(#{date}, INTERVAL+1 DAY), '%Y%m%d')

SELECT a.RESERVATIONID, a.RESERVATIONDATE, a.RESERVATIONSTATUS, b.COURSETIME, c.STYLISTID, c.STYLISTNAME FROM TRNRESERVATION a LEFT JOIN MSTCOURSE b ON b.COURSEID = a.COURSEID LEFT JOIN MSTSTYLIST c ON a.STYLISTID = c.STYLISTID WHERE a.RESERVATIONDATE > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND RESERVATIONDATE < DATE_FORMAT(Date_Add(NOW(), INTERVAL+1 DAY), '%Y%m%d')

SELECT a.RESERVATIONID, a.RESERVATIONDATE, a.RESERVATIONSTATUS, b.COURSETIME, c.STYLISTID, c.STYLISTNAME FROM TRNRESERVATION a LEFT JOIN MSTCOURSE b ON b.COURSEID = a.COURSEID LEFT JOIN MSTSTYLIST c ON a.STYLISTID = c.STYLISTID WHERE a.RESERVATIONDATE > DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y%m%d') AND RESERVATIONDATE < DATE_FORMAT(Date_Add(#{date}, INTERVAL+1 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
SELECT COURSEID, COURSENAME, COURSEPRICE, COURSETIME FROM MSTCOURSE

SELECT A.COURSEID AS COURSEID, A.COURSENAME AS COURSENAME, A.COURSEPRICE AS COURSEPRICE, A.COURSETIME AS COURSETIME, B.STYLISTID AS STYLISTID, B.STYLISTNAME AS STYLISTNAME FROM ( SELECT COURSEID, COURSENAME, COURSEPRICE, COURSETIME FROM MSTCOURSE WHERE COURSEID = #{courseId} ) A, ( SELECT STYLISTID, STYLISTNAME FROM MSTSTYLIST WHERE STYLISTID = #{stylistId} ) B
SELECT MAX(RESERVATIONID) AS CNT FROM TRNRESERVATION;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRNRESERVATION ( RESERVATIONID, RESERVATIONDATE, RESERVATIONSTATUS, COURSEID, USERID, STYLISTID ) VALUES ( #{reservationId}, #{reservationDateTime}, #{reservationStatus}, #{courseId}, #{userId}, #{stylistId} );
mapper.select: SELECT a.RESERVATIONID as RESERVATIONID, SUBSTR(a.RESERVATIONDATE,1,16 ) as RESERVATIONDATE, a.RESERVATIONSTATUS as RESERVATIONSTATUS, b.COURSENAME as COURSENAME, b.COURSEPRICE as COURSEPRICE, c.USERID as USERID, c.USERNAME as USERNAME, d.STYLISTNAME as STYLISTNAME FROM TRNRESERVATION a LEFT JOIN MSTCOURSE b ON b.COURSEID = a.COURSEID LEFT JOIN MSTUSER c ON c.USERID = a.USERID LEFT JOIN MSTSTYLIST d ON d.STYLISTID = a.STYLISTID WHERE a.USERID = #{userId}
